item.text: In those days there was another large crowd with nothing to eat. So Jesus called his disciples and said to them,

“I <st data-num="4697">have compassion</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they have <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="4357">been here with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756 5101" class="">nothing</st> to <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st>.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> I <st data-num="630" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st> <st data-num="3523" class="">hungry</st>, they will <st data-num="1590" class="">faint</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2240" class="">have come</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> a <st data-num="3113">great distance</st>.”

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4159">Where</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> get enough <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2047">desolate</st> <st data-num="2047" class="">place</st> to <st data-num="5526" class="">satisfy</st> <st data-num="3778">these people</st>?”

He <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4214">How many</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> do you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>?” They <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="2033">Seven</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3853" class="">directed</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> to <st data-num="377">sit down</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>. After he <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> and <st data-num="2168">gave thanks</st>, he <st data-num="2806" class="">broke</st> them <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began <st data-num="1325" class="">giving</st> them to the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3908" class="">serve</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="3908" class="">served</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>.

They <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="3641" class="">few</st> <st data-num="2485">small fish</st>. After <st data-num="2127">giving thanks</st> for <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st>, he <st data-num="3004">told</st> them to <st data-num="3908" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="2532">as well</st>.

Everyone<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2068">ate</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="5526" class="">satisfied</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="142" class="">picked up</st> the <st data-num="2801" class="">broken pieces</st> <st data-num="4051">left over</st>, <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="4711" class="">baskets</st> full.

There <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5070">4,000</st><n id="1" /> who ate.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="630" class="">dismissed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="3" />
Immediately he got into a boat with his disciples and went to the district of Dalmanutha.
Then the Pharisees came and began to argue with Jesus, asking for a sign from heaven to test him.

<st data-num="389">Sighing deeply</st> in <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> does <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st> <st data-num="2212">look for</st> a <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st>? I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> will be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>.”
Then he left them, got back into the boat, and went to the other side.
Now they had forgotten to take bread, except for one loaf they had with them in the boat.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1291" class="">ordered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3708">Watch out</st>! <st data-num="991" class="">Beware</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2219" class="">yeast</st> of the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2219" class="">yeast</st> of <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they began to <st data-num="1260" class="">discuss</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">about</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">having</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>.<n id="1" />

When he <st data-num="1097" class="">learned</st> of this,<n id="1" /> Jesus <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="1260" class="">arguing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">about</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">having</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>? Do you <st data-num="3768">still not</st> <st data-num="3340">see</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4920" class="">understand</st>? <st data-num="2192" class="">Have</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> been <st data-num="4456" class="">hardened</st>?

Though you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st>, <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> you <st data-num="991" class="">see</st>? <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> though you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3775" class="">ears</st>, <st data-num="3756">can’t</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756">Don’t</st> you <st data-num="3421" class="">remember</st>?

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st> I <st data-num="2806" class="">broke</st> the <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="4000">5,000</st>, <st data-num="4214">how many</st> <st data-num="2894" class="">baskets</st> <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="2801" class="">pieces</st> did you <st data-num="142">pick up</st>?” They <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="1427">Twelve</st>.”

“<st data-num="3753">When</st> I broke the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> loaves <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="5070">4,000</st>, <st data-num="4214">how many</st> <st data-num="4711" class="">baskets</st> <st data-num="4138" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="2801" class="">pieces</st> did you <st data-num="142">pick up</st>?” They <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2033">Seven</st>.”
Then he said to them, “Do you still not understand?”
Then they came to Bethsaida. They brought a blind man to Jesus and asked him to touch him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">He</st> <st data-num="1949" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="5185">blind man</st> by the <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="1627" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> of the <st data-num="2968" class="">village</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4429" class="">spit</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3659" class="">eyes</st>, <st data-num="2007" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> eyes<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st>, “Do you <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st>?”

<st data-num="308">Regaining his sight</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>, but they <st data-num="3708">look</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="1186" class="">trees</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st>.”

<st data-num="1534" class="">Then</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="846">man’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="1227">opened</st> his <st data-num="1227">eyes</st>,<n id="3" /> his sight was <st data-num="600" class="">restored</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1689" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="537" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="5081" class="">clearly</st>.
Jesus sent him home, saying, “Do not even go into the village.”
Then Jesus and his disciples went to the villages of Caesarea Philippi. On the way he asked his disciples, “Who do people say that I am?”

They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2491">John</st> the <st data-num="910" class="">Baptist</st>, <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> say <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161">and</st> still <st data-num="243" class="">others</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>.”

He <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1161">But</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> do you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> that <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st>?” <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.”<n id="2" />
Then he warned them not to tell anyone about him.
Then Jesus began to teach them that the Son of Man must suffer many things and be rejected by the elders, chief priests, and experts in the law, and be killed, and after three days rise again.

He <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">openly</st> about <st data-num="3056" class="">this</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="4355" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4355">aside</st> and <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuke</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
But after turning and looking at his disciples, he rebuked Peter and said, “Get behind me, Satan. You are not setting your mind on God’s interests, but on man’s.”
Then Jesus called the crowd, along with his disciples, and said to them, “If anyone wants to become my follower, he must deny himself, take up his cross, and follow me.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="622" class="">lose</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="622" class="">loses</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1752">because of</st> <st data-num="1473">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> because of the <st data-num="2098">gospel</st><n id="3" /> will <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="5623" class="">benefit</st> is it for a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2770" class="">gain</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2210" class="">forfeit</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st>?

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> can a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> in <st data-num="465" class="">exchange</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st>?

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">anyone</st> is <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3428" class="">adulterous</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinful</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>, the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will also be <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>.”
